description: This file defines a React functional component 'NotificationBell' that displays a notification bell icon with a badge indicating unread notifications. It imports React and a custom hook 'useNotifications' to access notification data, and renders a button with an SVG icon and optional unread count badge.

methods.name: NotificationBell({ onClick })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a notification bell icon with unread count badge. Accepts 'onClick' callback as prop.
